title: Super Bowl Opening Night Recap, 49ers & Chiefs take the stage in Miami (Football 1/28)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to recap Opening Night for Super Bowl LIV which took place Monday night at Marlins Park in Miami. The guys discussed the most entertaining moments of the night as well as the affect Kobe Bryant's passing had on the mood of the event (14:35). The guys continue to share observations (23:45) and winners (40:00) from the night before analyzing the Chargers breaking up with Philip Rivers (57:00) and the Browns hiring 32-year-old Andrew Berry as their new GM.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
